Dataset for Probabilistic Risk Assessment Question


## Triangular


```{r}
library(EnvStats)
library(tidyverse)

set.seed(42)

random <-
  rtri(500, min = 50 , max = 140, mode = 80)


random


random %>%
  as_data_frame() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = random)) +
    geom_histogram()
```


## Normal

```{r}

set.seed(100)

n = 250


# standard error = 0.63
# standard deviation @ SE * square root of n
# standard deviation @ n = 500 = 14.08
# standard deviation @ n = 500 = 9.96

random_n <-
  rnorm(n, mean = 90.6, sd = 0.63 * n^0.5) 

random_n

random_n %>% 
  as_data_frame() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = value)) +
    geom_histogram()

random_n %>%
  as_data_frame() %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = value)) +
    geom_density()

random_n %>% 
  mean()

random_n %>% 
  sd()


random_n %>% 
  as_data_frame() %>% 
  write_csv(., file = "./output/sample_dataset.csv", col_names = FALSE)


```
